publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

sourceDesc.p: Work of the literatures of Ethiopia and Eritrea
A TEI file converted from the ETHIO-authority google spreadsheet

relation.name: saws:isAttributedToAuthor
relation.desc: The work is traditionally attributed to Yāred māḫletāwi.

div.note: For the four first weeks, the following description of the structure of the Ṣoma dǝggʷā is based on the edition by . This includes a noteworthy distinction in the analysis of the placement of the Wāzemā/ Sark services: In the first week, the Wāzemā/ Sark service in the night between Sunday and Monday is analysed as the "Wāzemā/Sark service of Monday", the Wāzemā/ Sark service in the night between Monday and Tuesday is analysed as the "Wāzemā/Sark service of Tuesday", etc. By contrast, in the second and subsequent weeks, the Wāzemā/ Sark service in the night between Sunday and Monday is analysed as a second "Wāzemā/Sark service of Sunday", the Wāzemā/ Sark service in the night between Monday and Tuesday is analysed as the "Wāzemā/Sark service of Monday", etc. (however, the Wāzemā/ Sark service in the night between Saturday and Sunday is still analysed as the first "Wāzemā/Sark service of Sunday" – consequently, Sundays have two Wāzemā/ Sark services, whereas Saturdays have none). From the fifth week on, the description is based on the edition by Mangǝśtu Gabra ʾAb.

div.label: Set of antiphons for the first week of the Great Fast (ዘወረደ፡, Za-warada).
Set of antiphons for the Sunday of the first week.
Set of antiphons for the "Vigil of the Fast", i.e. the Wāzemā/ Sark service of the Sunday of the first week of the Great Fast (ዋዜማ፡ ዘመኃትወ፡ ድራረ፡ ጾም፡).

div.ab: ዘወረደ፡ አምላዕሉ፡ አይሁድ፡ ሰቀሉ፡ ወሚመ፡ ኢያእምሩ፡ እግዚአ፡ ኵሉ፡ ዘያሐዩ፡ በቃሉ።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the Mawaddǝs service of the Sunday of the first week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: ተቀነዩ፡ ለእግዚአብሔር፡ በፍርሀት፡ ወተሐሠዩ፡ ሎቱ፡ በረዓድ፡ እስመ፡ ለዓለም፡ ምሕረቱ፡ ለትውልደ፡ ትውልድ፡ ጽድቁ፡ ንሕነሰ፡ ሐዝቡ፡ ባኡ፡ ቅድሜሁ፡ በተጋንዮ፡ ወውስተ፡ አዕጻዲሁ፡ በስብሐት፡ እመንዎ፡ እ፡ ንጹም፡ ጾመ፡ ወናፍቅር፡ ቢጸነ፡ ወንትፋቀር፡ በበይናቲነ፡ እ፡ አክብሩ፡ ሰንበተ፡ ተገበሩ፡ ጽድቀ፡ እስመ፡ ሰንበትሰ፡ በእንተ፡ ሰብእ፡ ተፈጥረት፡ እ፡ ምሕረተ፡ ወፍትሐ፡ አሐሊ፡ ለከ፡ እዜምር፡ ወእሌቡ፡ ፍኖተ፡ ንጹሐ፡ እስመ፡ ለዓለም፡ ምሕረቱ፡ ለትውልደ፡ ትውልድ፡ ጽድቁ፡ ንሕነሰ፡ ሕዝቡ፡ አባግዐ፡ መርዔቱ።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the Monday of the first week.
Set of antiphons for the Wāzemā/ Sark service for the Monday of the first week of the Great Fast.
div.note: This set of antiphons can also be construed as a second Wāzemā/ Sark service for the Sunday of the first week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: ንብጻሕ፡ ቅድመ፡ ገጹ፡ በአሚን፡ ወበመዝሙር፡ ንየብብ፡ ሎቱ፡ ን፡ ንፀመዶ፡ ለልዑል፡ በጾም፡ ወበጸሎት፡ ን፡ በኵሉ፡ ጊዜ፡ ወበኵሉ፡ ሰዓት፡ ንብጻሕ፡ ቅድመ፡ ገጹ፡ በአሚን፡ ንብጻሕ፡ ቅድመ፡ ገጹ፡ በአሚን።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the Sǝbḥata nagh service for the Monday of the first week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: ከመዝ፡ ይቤ፡ ሙሴ፡ ፀአቱ፡ እምትዕይንት፡ ሶበ፡ ይሠርቅ፡ ፀሓይ፡ ተንሥእ፡ እግዚኦ፡ ወይዘረዉ፡ ፀርከ፡ ወይጕየዩ፡ ኵሎሙ፡ እለ፡ ይጸልኡከ፡ ወበማኅደሩሰ፡ ይቤ፡ ተመየጥ፡ እግዚኦ፡ ላዕለ፡ እስራኤል፡ ሕዝብከ፡ በእልፍ፡ ወበአእላፍ።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the service of the 3rd Hour for the Monday of the first week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 6th Hour for the Monday of the first week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 9th Hour for the Monday of the first week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the Tuesday of the first week.
Set of antiphons for the Wāzemā/ Sark service for the Tuesday of the first week of the Great Fast.
div.note: This set of antiphons can also be construed as a Wāzemā/ Sark service for the Monday of the first week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: ምሕረትከ፡ ወጽድቅከ፡ ዘልፈ፡ ይርከባኒ፡ ሥመር፡ እግዚኦ፡ ከመ፡ ታድኅነኒ፡ ዘአድኀንኮ፡ ለዳዊት፡ ገብርከ፡ ዘሜጥካሁ፡ ለጳውሎስ፡ በኂሩትከ፡ ወሊተኒ፡ ለገብርከ፡ ሚጠኒ፡ ኀቤከ።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the Sǝbḥata nagh service for the Tuesday of the first week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: በሐ፡ በልዋ፡ ተሳለምዋ፡ ጊሡ፡ ኀቤሃ፡ ኢትርሐቁ፡ እምኔሃ፡ እስመ፡ ዋካ፡ ይእቲ፡ ወብርሃን፡ ይእቲ፡ ትበርህ፡ እምፀሓይ፡ ይእቲ፡ ትትሌዐል፡ እምአድባር፡ ታቦት፡ ሕጉ፡ ለንጉሥ፡ ዐቢይ፡ ደብተራ፡ ፍጽምት፡ እመ፡ ኵሉ፡ ሕዝብ፡ ተሀሉ፡ ማእከሌክሙ፡ አኀው።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the service of the 3rd Hour for the Tuesday of the first week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 6th Hour for the Tuesday of the first week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 9th Hour for the Tuesday of the first week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the Wednesday of the first week.
Set of antiphons for the Wāzemā/ Sark service for the Wednesday of the first week of the Great Fast.
div.note: This set of antiphons can also be construed as a Wāzemā/ Sark service for the Tuesday of the first week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: ረዳኢ፡ ለእለ፡ ውስተ፡ ሠርም፡ ወለእለ፡ ይትመነደቡ፡ መቅለሊ፡ ለርኁባን፡ ዘይኄሊ፡ ወይትቤቀል፡ ለግፉዓን፡ ዐርከ፡ መሃይምናን፡ መስተናግር፡ ለጻድቃን፡ ወማኅደር፡ ለንጹሓን፡ ወለእለ፡ በጽድቅ፡ ይጼውዕዎ፡ ሰማዒ።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the Sǝbḥata nagh service for the Wednesday of the first week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: ምርሐኒ፡ ፍኖተ፡ ወእሑር፡ ቤቶ፡ ለአምላከ፡ ያዕቆብ፡ እስመ፡ ኪያሃ፡ አኀሥሥ፡ ዘአፍቀረት፡ ነፍስየ፡ ማኅደረ፡ ስምከ፡ ከመ፡ ተሀበኒ፡ ተምኔትየ፡ ኵሎ፡ አሚረ።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the service of the 3rd Hour for the Wednesday of the first week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 6th Hour for the Wednesday of the first week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 9th Hour for the Wednesday of the first week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the Thursday of the first week.
Set of antiphons for the Wāzemā/ Sark service for the Thursday of the first week of the Great Fast.
div.note: This set of antiphons can also be construed as a Wāzemā/ Sark service for the Wednesday of the first week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: ሰርከ፡ ናአኵተከ፡ ወንሴብሐከ፡ መፍቀሬ፡ ሰብእ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ ዘአውዐልከነ፡ ኵሎ፡ ኑኀ፡ ዕለት፡ አቢተነ፡ በጸጋ፡ መድኀኒትከ።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the Sǝbḥata nagh service for the Thursday of the first week of the Great Fast.
div.note: The second incipit provided below is only provided in abbreviated form in .

div.ab: አንሥኢ፡ አዕይንቲኪ፡ ጽዮን፡ ወነጽሪ፡ ዐውደኪ፡ እስመ፡ አዕበየ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ሣህሎ፡ ላዕሌኪ፡ ይትኀፈሩ፡ ጸላእትኪ፡ እለ፡ ኢይቀርቡ፡ ኀቤኪ፡ ተሐነጺ፡ በጽድቅ፡ ረሐቂ፡ እምዐመፃ፡ ወኢይሁብ፡ ለባዕድ፡ ክብረኪ።
በጽድቅ፡ ወበተፋቅሮ፡ እስመ፡ ረከብኩ፡ እምውስተ፡ ደቂቅኪ፡ ይቤ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ በነቢይ፡ የሐንጹ፡ አሕዛብ፡ አረፋተኪ፡ አምኂ፡ ደቂቀ፡ እኅትኪ፡ ኅሪት፡ መድኀኒት፡ ወሕይወት፡ ህየንተ፡ አበውኪ፡ ተወልዱ፡ ለኪ፡ ደቂቅ።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the service of the 3rd Hour for the Thursday of the first week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 6th Hour for the Thursday of the first week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 9th Hour for the Thursday of the first week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the Friday of the first week.
Set of antiphons for the Wāzemā/ Sark service for the Friday of the first week of the Great Fast.
div.note: This set of antiphons can also be construed as a Wāzemā/ Sark service for the Thursday of the first week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: ናአኵተከ፡ እግዚኦ፡ አምላክነ፡ ዘአውዐልከነ፡ ኵሎ፡ ኑኀ፡ ዕለት፡ ዘአንተ፡ ተአምር፡ ኅቡኣተ፡ ልብነ፡ አኰቴተ፡ ስብሐት፡ ናዐርግ፡ ለከ።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the Sǝbḥata nagh service for the Friday of the first week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: በሐ፡ ንበላ፡ ኵልነ፡ ንሳለማ፡ እምነ፡ ለቅድስት፡ ቤተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡ እስመ፡ ሐነጽዋ፡ ለቤተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡ ወሣረርዋ፡ በመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ከመ፡ ትኩን፡ አርአያ፡ ዘበሰማያት፡ ከመ፡ ታድኅነነ፡ እምእቶነ፡ እሳት።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the service of the 3rd Hour for the Friday of the first week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 6th Hour for the Friday of the first week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 9th Hour for the Friday of the first week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the Saturday of the first week.
Set of antiphons for the Wāzemā/ Sark service for the Saturday of the first week of the Great Fast.
div.note: This set of antiphons can also be construed as a Wāzemā/ Sark service for the Friday of the first week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: ተስፋየ፡ እምንእስየ፡ ምርጉዝ፡ ለርሥኣንየ፡ ዝንቱ፡ ውእቱ፡ መስቀል፡ መርሖሙ፡ አንተ፡ ለዕዉራን፡ ምርጉዞሙ፡ ለሐንካሳን፡ አንሰ፡ እትአመን፡ ወኣሰምክ፡ በመስቀልከ፡ ይገንዩ፡ አሕዛብ፡ ለስምከ፡ እግዚኦ።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the Sǝbḥata nagh service for the Saturday of the first week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: ለኢየሩሳሌም፡ ሐጹር፡ የዐውዳ፡ በኀይለ፡ መስቀሉ፡ ጸንዐ፡ ማኅፈዳ፡ ዕዝራኒ፡ ርእያ፡ ወፈርሀ፡ ቀሪቦታ፡ ዐቢይ፡ ኀይል፡ ተገብረ፡ በውስቴታ፡ ደብተራ፡ እንተ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ተከለ፡ መልአክ፡ ተናገራ፡ ወማኅደሮ፡ ረሰያ።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the second week of the Great Fast (ቅድስት፡, Qǝddǝst).
Set of antiphons for the Sunday of the second week (Sunday of Qǝddǝst, ቅድስት፡).
Set of antiphons for the first Wāzemā/ Sark service of the Sunday of the second week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: ዛቲ፡ ዕለት፡ ቅድስት፡ ይእቲ፡ ለውሉደ፡ ሰብእ፡ መድኀኒት፡ ትኩነነ፡ መርሐ፡ በፍኖት፡ በኵሉ፡ ጊዜ፡ ወበኵሉ፡ ሰዓት። ቀደሳ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ለሰንበት።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the Mawaddǝs service of the Sunday of the second week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: ግነዩ፡ ለእግዚአብሔር፡ ወጸውዑ፡ ስሞ፡ ወንግርዎሙ፡ ለአሕዛብ፡ ምግባሮ፡ ሀቡ፡ ስብሐተ፡ ለስሙ፡ አክብሩ፡ ሰንበተ፡ ተገበሩ፡ ጽድቀ፡ ዝግቡ፡ ለክሙ፡ መዝገበ፡ ዘበሰማያት፡ ኀበ፡ ፃፄ፡ ኢያማስኖ፡ ወኢይረክቡ፡ ሰራቂ፡ ድልዋኒክሙ፡ ንበሩ፡ ዘበላዕሉ፡ ኀልዩ፡ ኀበ፡ ሀሎ፡ ክርስቶስ።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the second Wāzemā/ Sark service of the Sunday of the second week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the Monday of the second week.
Set of antiphons for the Sǝbḥata nagh service for the Monday of the second week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: ነያ፡ ጽዮን፡ ቅድስት፡ ነያ፡ ጽዮን፡ መድኀኒት፡ አቡነ፡ ዘበሰማያት፡ ለከ፡ ይደሉ፡ ስብሐት።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the service of the 3rd Hour for the Monday of the second week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 6th Hour for the Monday of the second week of the Great Fast.

Set of antiphons for the Wāzemā/ Sark service for the Monday of the second week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the Tuesday of the second week.
Set of antiphons for the Sǝbḥata nagh service for the Tuesday of the second week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: እነግረክሙ፡ አኀውየ፡ ጸጋ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ዘተውህበ፡ ለቤተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡ ዘእመቄዶንያ፡ እምብዝኀ፡ መከራ፡ ሕማሞሙ፡ ፈድፋደ፡ ፍሥሐሆሙ።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the service of the 3rd Hour for the Tuesday of the second week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 6th Hour for the Tuesday of the second week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 9th Hour for the Tuesday of the second week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the Wāzemā/ Sark service for the Tuesday of the second week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the Wednesday of the second week.
Set of antiphons for the Sǝbḥata nagh service for the Wednesday of the second week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: ሐዋዘ፡ ብርሃነ፡ ጸግወነ፡ እግዚኦ፡ ነግሀ፡ ነቂሀነ፡ እምንዋም፡ ንጊሣ፡ ለቤተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡ ኀበ፡ የኀድር፡ ብዕለ፡ ስብሐቲሁ፡ ንስእል፡ ዘእምኀቤሁ፡ ረድኤተ፡ ወሕይወተ፡ ኵሉ፡ ዘጌሠ፡ ወመጽአ፡ ኀቤሃ፡ ኢይጻሙ።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the service of the 3rd Hour for the Wednesday of the second week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 6th Hour for the Wednesday of the second week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 9th Hour for the Wednesday of the second week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the Wāzemā/ Sark service for the Wednesday of the second week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the Thursday of the second week.
Set of antiphons for the Sǝbḥata nagh service for the Thursday of the second week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: ትበርህ፡ እምኮከበ፡ ጽባሕ፡ ወታስተርኢ፡ እምአርእስተ፡ አድባር፡ አዳም፡ ወሠናይት፡ ጽዕዱት፡ ወብርህት፡ ከመ፡ ፀሓይ።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the service of the 3rd Hour for the Thursday of the second week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 6th Hour for the Thursday of the second week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 9th Hour for the Thursday of the second week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the Wāzemā/ Sark service for the Thursday of the second week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the Friday of the second week.
Set of antiphons for the Sǝbḥata nagh service for the Friday of the second week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: ወአንተሰ፡ ጊሥ፡ ኀበ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ጸሊ፡ ወትረ፡ ወኢትናፍቅ፡ ለጸሎት፡ እንዘ፡ ትትአመን፡ ሰአል፡ እንዘ፡ ትብል፡ አቡነ፡ ዘበሰማያት።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the service of the 3rd Hour for the Friday of the second week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 6th Hour for the Friday of the second week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 9th Hour for the Friday of the second week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the Wāzemā/ Sark service for the Friday of the second week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the Saturday of the second week.
Set of antiphons for the Sǝbḥata nagh service for the Saturday of the second week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: በአፍአኒ፡ መስቀል፡ ወበውሣጤኒ፡ መስቀል፡ በገዳምኒ፡ መስቀል፡ እንዘ፡ ጸልመተ፡ ያበርህ።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the third week of the Great Fast (ምኵራብ፡, Mǝkʷrāb).
Set of antiphons for the Sunday of the third week (Sunday of the Temple, ምኵራብ፡).
Set of antiphons for the first Wāzemā/ Sark service of the Sunday of the third week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: በዕለተ፡ ሰንበት፡ ቦአ፡ ኢየሱስ፡ ምኵራበ፡ አይሁድ፡ ምህሮሙ፡ ወይቤሎሙ፡ ለእመ፡ ኪያየ፡ ኢአመንክሙ፡ ለግብርየ፡ እመኑ፡ አንትሙ፡ ጊዜ፡ መዋዕለ፡ ዓመታት፡ ዕለታተ፡ ሰንበታተ፡ ኢፈለጥክሙ፡ እንዳዒ።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the Mawaddǝs service of the Sunday of the third week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the second Wāzemā/ Sark service of the Sunday of the third week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the Monday of the third week.
Set of antiphons for the Sǝbḥata nagh service for the Monday of the third week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: ክርስቶስ፡ ብነ፡ ጸወንነ፡ ወኀይልነ፡ ጽንዕነ፡ ቤዛነ፡ መድኀኒተ፡ ነፍስነ፡ ኪያሁ፡ ናአኵት፡ ኵልነ፡ ለዘአንቅሀነ፡ እምንዋም።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the service of the 3rd Hour for the Monday of the third week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 6th Hour for the Monday of the third week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 9th Hour for the Monday of the third week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the Wāzemā/ Sark service for the Monday of the third week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the Tuesday of the third week.
Set of antiphons for the Sǝbḥata nagh service for the Tuesday of the third week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: ተክዕወ፡ በላዕሌነ፡ ትአዛዘ፡ ኦሪት፡ ወነቢያት። ኖን። ማኅቶት፡ ለእግርየ፡ ሕግከ፡ ብርሃን፡ ለፍኖትየ፡ ካልእ፡ ሕግ፡ አእምሮ፡ ቃላተ፡ ጽድቅ፡ ፍጹመ፡ ተፋቅሮ፡ ይእቲ፡ ታድኅን፡ እሞት።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the service of the 3rd Hour for the Tuesday of the third week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 6th Hour for the Tuesday of the third week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 9th Hour for the Tuesday of the third week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the Wāzemā/ Sark service for the Tuesday of the third week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the Wednesday of the third week.
Set of antiphons for the Sǝbḥata nagh service for the Wednesday of the third week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: ውእተ፡ አሚረ፡ ይትወሀቦሙ፡ ካልእ፡ ልብ፡ ትሠርጽ፡ ሃይማኖት፡ ወይትመዋእ፡ ሞት፡ ይመጽእ፡ ጽድቅ፡ ወይትጋበእ፡ ትዕግሥት፡ ውእተ፡ አሚረ፡ ይነቅህ፡ ዓለም፡ ዘአልቦ፡ አመ፡ ነቅሀ፡ ወምድርኒ፡ አመ፡ ታግብእ፡ ማሕፀንታ፡ ውእተ፡ አሚረ፡ አልቦ፡ ክረምት፡ ወኢሐጋይ፡ ዘአንበለ፡ መብረቀ፡ ስብሐቲሁ፡ ወብርሃኑ፡ ለእግዚአብሔር፡ ከመ፡ ይርአይ፡ ኵሉ፡ ዘጽኑሕ፡ ሎቱ።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the service of the 3rd Hour for the Wednesday of the third week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 6th Hour for the Wednesday of the third week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 9th Hour for the Wednesday of the third week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the Wāzemā/ Sark service for the Wednesday of the third week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the Thursday of the third week.
Set of antiphons for the Sǝbḥata nagh service for the Thursday of the third week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: አንትሙሰ፡ ከመዝ፡ ንዑ፡ ውስተ፡ ይእቲ፡ ሀገር፡ እለ፡ ሥዩማን፡ ሊቃውንተ፡ ቤተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡ ሃሌ፡ ሉያ፡ ሃሌ፡ ሉያ፡ ሃሌ፡ ሉያ፡ ስብሐት፡ ለእግዚአብሔር፡ በጽዮን።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the service of the 3rd Hour for the Thursday of the third week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 6th Hour for the Thursday of the third week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 9th Hour for the Thursday of the third week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the Wāzemā/ Sark service for the Thursday of the third week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the Friday of the third week.
Set of antiphons for the Sǝbḥata nagh service for the Friday of the third week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: ወተዘከረ፡ ሣህሎ፡ ለዓለም፡ ዘሠርዐ፡ ለአብርሃም፡ ወመሐለ፡ ለይስሐቅ፡ ወአቀመ፡ ስምዐ፡ ለያዕቆብ፡ እስመ፡ ደብተራሁ፡ እንተ፡ ተከላ፡ ለስምዕ።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the service of the 3rd Hour for the Friday of the third week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 6th Hour for the Friday of the third week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 9th Hour for the Friday of the third week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the Wāzemā/ Sark service for the Friday of the third week of the Great Fast.
div.note: No antiphons for this service are provided in .

div.label: Set of antiphons for the Saturday of the third week.
Set of antiphons for the Sǝbḥata nagh service for the Friday of the third week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: ገሠጸ፡ ባሕረ፡ ወነፋሳተ፡ ወኵሉ፡ ፍጥረት፡ ያከብርዋ፡ ለሰንበት፡ በኀይለ፡ መስቀሉ፡ አጋንንተ፡ አውፅአ፡ እለ፡ ለምጽ፡ አንጽሐ፡ ገብረ፡ ተኣምረ፡ ፈወሰ፡ ዱያነ፡ ወከሠተ፡ አዕይንተ፡ ዕዉራን፡ ወኵሎ፡ ፈጺሞ፡ አዕረፈ፡ እግዚእነ፡ በሰንበት።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the fourth week of the Great Fast (መፃጕዕ፡, Maṣ́agʷǝʿ).
Set of antiphons for the Sunday of the fourth week (Sunday of the Paralytic, መፃጕዕ፡).
Set of antiphons for the first Wāzemā/ Sark service of the Sunday of the fourth week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: ውእቱ፡ እግዚኣ፡ ለሰንበት፡ ወአቡሃ፡ ለምሕረት፡ ቤትየሰ፡ ቤቱ፡ ጸሎት፡ ይሰመይ፡ ቤተ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ወማኅደሩ፡ ለልዑል። ቤትየሰ፡ ቤተ፡ ጸሎት፡ ይሰመይ፡ ቤተ፡ ረሰይክሙ፡ አንትሙ፡ በአተ፡ ፈያት፡ ቤ፡ አሕየዎ፡ ኢየሱስ፡ ለመፃጕዕ፡ ለዘ፴ወ፰ክረምተ፡ ሐመ።
ወልደ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ተኣምረ፡ ገብረ፡ አሕየወ፡ በሥልጣኑ፡ ዐይነ፡ ዕዉረ፡? ዘዘዚአሁ፡ ኅቡረ፡ ወለዕረፍተ፡ ኵሉ፡ ሰንበተ፡ ፈጠረ፡ በሰንበት፡ ዐርገ፡ ሐመረ፡ ገሠጸ፡ ባሕረ፡ ወገሠጾሙ፡ ለነፋሳት፡ ወወረቀ፡ ምድረ፡ ወገብረ፡ ጽቡረ፡ አሕየወ፡ ዕዉረ፡ ወ፡ ገብረ፡ ተኣምረ፡ በሰንበት፡ መድኀኒነ፡ ክርስቶስ።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the Mawaddǝs service of the Sunday of the fourth week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the second Wāzemā/ Sark service of the Sunday of the fourth week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the Monday of the fourth week.
Set of antiphons for the Sǝbḥata nagh service for the Monday of the fourth week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: በትረ፡ ኀይል፡ ይፌኑ፡ ለከ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ እምጽዮን፡ ወትኳንን፡ በማእከለ፡ ጸላእትከ፡ ይዕቀብከ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ አምኵሉ፡ እኩይ፡ ወየሀብከ፡ ሞገሰ፡ ከመ፡ ሞገሰ፡ ዳዊት፡ በቅደመ፡ እግዚአብሔር።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the service of the 3rd Hour for the Monday of the fourth week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 6th Hour for the Monday of the fourth week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 9th Hour for the Monday of the fourth week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the Wāzemā/ Sark service for the Monday of the fourth week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the Tuesday of the fourth week.
Set of antiphons for the Sǝbḥata nagh service for the Tuesday of the fourth week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: እምነ፡ ጽዮን፡ በሐ፡ ቅድስት፡ ቤተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡ ስርጉት፡ በስብሐት፡ አረፋቲሃ፡ ዘመረግድ፡ ስ፡ ወማኅፈዲሃኒ፡ ዘቢረሌ፡ ስ፡ እምሥነ፡ ገድሎሙ፡ ለሰማዕት፡ ስ፡ ታቦተ፡ ሕጉ፡ ለንጉሥ፡ ዐቢይ፡ ስ፡ እስመ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ መሠረትኪ፡ ፀሓየ፡ ጽድቅ፡ ያበርህ፡ ለኪ።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the service of the 3rd Hour for the Tuesday of the fourth week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 6th Hour for the Tuesday of the fourth week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 9th Hour for the Tuesday of the fourth week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the Wāzemā/ Sark service for the Tuesday of the fourth week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the Wednesday of the fourth week.
Set of antiphons for the Sǝbḥata nagh service for the Wednesday of the fourth week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: በጽድቅ፡ ወበተፋቅሮ፡ እስመ፡ ረከብኩ፡ እምውስተ፡ ደቂቅኪ፡ ይቤ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ በነቢይ፡ የሕንጽ፡ አሕዛብ፡ አረፋተኪ፡ አምኂ፡ ደቂቀ፡ እኅትኪ፡ ኅሪት፡ መድኀኒት፡ ወሕይወት፡ ህየንተ፡ አበውኪ፡ ተወልዱ፡ ለኪ፡ ደቂቅ።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the service of the 3rd Hour for the Wednesday of the fourth week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 6th Hour for the Wednesday of the fourth week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 9th Hour for the Wednesday of the fourth week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the Wāzemā/ Sark service for the Wednesday of the fourth week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the Thursday of the fourth week.
Set of antiphons for the Sǝbḥata nagh service for the Thursday of the fourth week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: እምነ፡ ጽዮን፡ በሐ፡ በጽባሕ፡ ፍሥሓ፡ እ፡ ነሣእናሃ፡ ትኩነ፡ መርሐ፡ እ፡ ከመ፡ ታድኅነነ፡ እምእደ፡ ፀርነ፡ እ፡ ወታንግፈነ፡ እምእደ፡ ጸላእትነ፡ እ፡ እሞሙ፡ ሰማዕት፡ ወእኅቶሙ፡ ለመላእክት፡ እ፡ ሀገሪቶሙ፡ ለቅዱሳን፡ እንተ፡ በሰማያት፡ ንበላ፡ በሐ፡ ነሣእናሃ፡ ትኩነነ፡ መርሐ።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the service of the 3rd Hour for the Thursday of the fourth week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 6th Hour for the Thursday of the fourth week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 9th Hour for the Thursday of the fourth week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the Wāzemā/ Sark service for the Thursday of the fourth week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the Friday of the fourth week.
Set of antiphons for the Sǝbḥata nagh service for the Friday of the fourth week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: ወሪድየ፡ ብሔረ፡ ሮሜ፡ ለቤተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡ ርኢክዋ፡ አእመርክዋ፡ አፍቀርክዋ፡ ከመ፡ እኅትየ፡ ሠናየ፡ ኀለፍኩ፡ እምድኅረ፡ ጕንዱይ፡ መዋዕል፡ ወእምዝ፡ እምድኅረ፡ ኅዳጥ፡ ዓመታት፡ ካዕበ፡ ርኢክዋ፡ ወትትኀፀብ፡ በፈለገ፡ ጤግሮስ።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the service of the 3rd Hour for the Friday of the fourth week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 6th Hour for the Friday of the fourth week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 9th Hour for the Friday of the fourth week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the Wāzemā/ Sark service for the Friday of the fourth week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the Saturday of the fourth week.
Set of antiphons for the Sǝbḥata nagh service for the Saturday of the fourth week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: ኀይለ፡ መስቀሉ፡ ለክርስቶስ፡ ጽንዕ፡ ወጥቅም፡ ሐጹር፡ የዐውዳ፡ ዳዊትኒ፡ ይቤ፡ ነኪር፡ ነገሩ፡ በእንተአኪ፡ ሀገረ፡ እግዚአብሔር።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the fifth week of the Great Fast (ደብረ፡ ዘይት፡, Dabra Zayt).
Set of antiphons for the Sunday of the fifth week (Sunday of the Mount of Olives) ዋዜማ፡ ዘደብረ፡ ዘይት፡).
Set of antiphons for the first Wāzemā/ Sark service of the Sunday of the fifth week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: እንዘ፡ ይነብር፡ እግዚእነ፡ ውስተ፡ ደብረ፡ ዘይት፡ ወይቤሎሙ፡ ለአርዳኢሁ፡ ዑቁኬ፡ ኢያስሕቱክሙ፡ ወንበሩ፡ ድልዋኒክሙ፡ በሰንበት፡ ኢይኩን፡ ጕያክሙ።
እንዘ፡ ይነብር፡ እግዚእነ፡ ውስተ፡ ደብረ፡ ዘይት፡ ወይቤሎሙ፡ ለአርዳኢሁ፡ በዕለተ፡ ሰንበት፡ ካዕበ፡ ይቤሎሙ፡ ኢየሱስ፡ ለአርዳኢሁ፡ እምበለሰ፡ አእምሩ፡ አምሳሊሁ፡ ከመ፡ በጽሐ፡ ጊዜሁ፡ ለማዕረር።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the Mawaddǝs service of the Sunday of the fifth week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the second Wāzemā/ Sark service of the Sunday of the fifth week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the Monday of the fifth week.
Set of antiphons for the Sǝbḥata nagh service for the Monday of the fifth week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: አንቅሐኒ፡ በጽባሕ፡ ክሥተኒ፡ ዕዝንየ፡ በዘአጸምዕ፡ አምላኪየ፡ አምላኪየ፡ እገይሥ፡ ኀቤከ፡ ዘይሰማዕ፡ ግበር፡ ሊተ፡ ምሕረተከ፡ በጽባሕ።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the service of the 3rd Hour for the Monday of the fifth week of the Great Fast.

Set of antiphons for the Tuesday of the fifth week.
Set of antiphons for the Sǝbḥata nagh service for the Tuesday of the fifth week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: ወአንሰ፡ በብዝኃ፡ ምሕረትከ፡ እበውእ፡ ቤተከ፡ ወእሰግድ፡ ውስተ፡ ጽርሐ፡ መቅደስከ፡ በፈሪሆትከ፡ እግዚኦ፡ ምርሐኒ፡ በጽድቅከ።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the service of the 3rd Hour for the Tuesday of the fifth week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 6th Hour for the Tuesday of the fifth week of the Great Fast.

Set of antiphons for the Wāzemā/ Sark service for the Tuesday of the fifth week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the Wednesday of the fifth week.
Set of antiphons for the Sǝbḥata nagh service for the Wednesday of the fifth week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: ኢሳይያስኒ፡ ይቤ፡ ይኅድግ፡ ኃጥእ፡ ፍኖቶ፡ ወብእሲ፡ ዓማፂ፡ ምክሮ፡ ወይትመየጥ፡ ኀበ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ አምላኩ፡ እስመ፡ ይቤ፡ እሄሉ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ምስሌሁ፡ ወሣህልየሰ፡ ኢይከልዕ፡ እምኔሁ።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the service of the 3rd Hour for the Wednesday of the fifth week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 6th Hour for the Wednesday of the fifth week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 9th Hour for the Wednesday of the fifth week of the Great Fast.

Set of antiphons for the Thursday of the fifth week.
Set of antiphons for the Sǝbḥata nagh service for the Thursday of the fifth week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: አኃውየ፡ ኢታዕብዩ፡ ልበክሙ፡ ወአትሕቱ፡ ርእሰክሙ፡ ታሕተ፡ እዴሁ፡ ለእግዚአብሔር፡ ፅንዕት፡ ኀበ፡ ዘይክል፡ አድኅኖታ፡ ረዲኦታ፡ ለነፍስክሙ፡ አኃውየ፡ ኢታዕብዩ፡ ልበክሙ፡ ዲበ፡ ቢጽክሙ፡ እስመ፡ ኵሉ፡ ፆሮ፡ ይፀውር።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the service of the 3rd Hour for the Thursday of the fifth week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 6th Hour for the Thursday of the fifth week of the Great Fast.

Set of antiphons for the Friday of the fifth week.
Set of antiphons for the Sǝbḥata nagh service for the Friday of the fifth week of the Great Fast.

div.ab: ይሴፎ፡ ሰብእ፡ ይርከብ፡ ተስፋሁ፡ ይሴፎ፡ ሰብእ፡ ኀበ፡ ፈጣሪሁ፡ ወይኔጽራ፡ አዕይንቲሁ፡ ኀበ፡ ቅዱሰ፡ ፳ኤል፡ ለመስተዓግሣን፡ አንተ፡ ኃይል፡ እግዚኦ።

div.label: Set of antiphons for the service of the 3rd Hour for the Friday of the fifth week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 6th Hour for the Friday of the fifth week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the service of the 9th Hour for the Friday of the fifth week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the Wāzemā/ Sark service for the Friday of the fifth week of the Great Fast.
Set of antiphons for the feast of Matthias the Apostle (8 Maggābit).
Set of antiphons for the Sǝbḥata nagh service for the feast of Matthias the Apostle (8 Maggābit).

div.ab: እለ፡ ኃረይከ፡ ወጸዋዕከ፡ ከመ፡ ይኩኑ፡ ቅዱሳኒከ፡ ነገሩ፡ ወአስምዑ፡ ቃለከ፡ ቃለ፡ ሕይወት፡ ቃለ፡ መድኃኒት፡ እስመ፡ ጻድቅ፡ ውእቱ፡ ጸውዖሙ፡ በጽድቁ፡ ወረሱ፡ መንግሥተ፡ ሰማያት፡

div.label: Set of antiphons for the feast of the Cross in the Great Fast (10 Maggābit).
Set of antiphons for the Sǝbḥata nagh service for the feast of the Cross in the Great Fast (10 Maggābit).

div.ab: ካልዕ፡ ክብሩ፡ ለፀሐይ፡ ካልዕ፡ ክብሩ፡ ለወርኅ፡ ካልዕ፡ ክብሮሙ፡ ለከዋክብት፡ ኮከብ፡ አምኮከብ፡ ይኄይስ፡ ክብሩ፡ ወንሕነኒ፡ ንትኬለል፡ ዮም፡ በዕፀ፡ መስቀሉ፡ ለክርስቶስ።
